mapper.insert: insert into cms_article (title, picture, channel_id, category_id, user_id, hits, hot, status, deleted, created, updated, commentCnt, content) values (#{article.title}, #{article.picture}, #{article.channelId}, #{article.categoryId}, #{article.userId}, #{article.hits}, #{article.hot}, #{article.status}, #{article.deleted}, #{article.created}, #{article.updated}, #{article.commentcnt}, #{article.content})
mapper.update: update cms_article set title = #{article.title}, picture = #{article.picture}, channel_id = #{article.channelId}, category_id = #{article.categoryId}, user_id = #{article.userId}, hits = #{article.hits}, hot = #{article.hot}, status = #{article.status}, deleted = #{article.deleted}, created = #{article.created}, updated = #{article.updated}, commentCnt = #{article.commentcnt}, content = #{article.content} where id = #{id}
update cms_article set hot = hot+1 where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from cms_article where id in(${ids})
